thread.title: Initialized Capital Bets on Blockchain’s Inherent Security

author: Sara Castellanos
title: Initialized Capital Bets on Blockchain’s Inherent Security
text:
Blockchain marks a sharp departure from traditional internet infrastructure based on servers, storage and databases, all of which can be hacked. It’s the decentralized architecture that makes blockchain unique and inherently more secure, say Garry Tan and Alexis Ohanian, the co-founders of Initialized Capital.
That’s one of the reasons the venture firm recently led a $2.1 million investment in DDEX, which aims to build a secure, decentralized cryptocurrency trading platform. DDEX lets buyers and sellers of cryptocurrencies...
